type="ns">Malabar</as0><as1>Malabar</as1></c1>~;~<c1>all_accounts_describe_him_as_having_led_an_erratic_controversial_life</c1>~;~<c1>his_learning_and_sanctity_were_in_such_repute_that_he_was_held_to_have_been_an_incarnation_of_<as0>S3iva</as0><as1><s>Siva</s></as1>_,_and_to_have_worked_various_miracles</c1>~;~<c1>he_is_said_to_have_died_at_the_age_of_thirty-two_,_and_to_have_had_four_principal_disciples_,_called_<as0>Padma-pa1da</as0><as1><s>padma-pAda</s></as1>_,_<as0>Hasta7malaka</as0><as1><s>hastA<srs/>malaka</s></as1>_,_<as0>Sures3vara</as0><as1><s>sureSvara</s></as1>_or_<as0>Mandana</as0><as1><s>mandana</s></as1>_,_and_<as0>Trot2aka</as0><as1><s>trowaka</s></as1></c1>~;~<c1>another_of_his_disciples_,_<as0>A1nanda-giri</as0><as1><s>Ananda-giri</s></as1>_,_wrote_a_history_of_his_controversial_exploits_,_called_<as0>S3am2kara-vijaya</as0><as1><s>SaMkara-vijaya</s></as1></c1>~<qv/>~;~<c1>tradition_makes_him_the_founder_of_one_of_the_principal_<as0>S3aiva</as0><as1><s>SEva</s></as1>_sects_,_the_<asp0>Das3a-na1mi-Dan2d2ins</asp0><as1><s>daSa-nAmi-daRqin</s>s</as1>_or_<quote>_Ten-named_Mendicants_</quote></c1>~<ls>RTL._87</ls>~;~<c1>he_is_the_reputed_author_of_a_large_number_of_original_works_,_such_as_the_<as0>A1tma-bodha</as0><as1><s>Atma-boDa</s></as1>_,_<as0>A1nanda-lahari1</as0><as1><s>Ananda-laharI</s></as1>_,_<as0>Jn5a1na-bodhini1</as0><as1><s>jYAna-boDinI</s></as1>__,_<as0>Man2i-ratna-ma1la1</as0><as1><s>maRi-ratna-mAlA</s></as1>_,_<etc1/></c1>~;~<c1>and_commentaries_on_the_<asp0>Upanishads</asp0><as1><s>upanizad</s>s</as1>_,_and_on_the_<as0>Brahma-mi1ma1n6sa1</as0><as1><s>brahma-mImAMsA</s></as1>_or_<as0>Veda1nta-su1tra</as0><as1><s>vedAnta-sUtra</s></as1>_,_<as0>Bhagavadgi1ta1</as0><as1><s>BagavadgItA</s></as1>_,_and_<as0>Maha1-bha1rata</as0><as1><s>mahA-BArata</s></as1>_,_<etc1/></c1></p></c>
